article.title: General Dynamics Advanced Information Systems to Provide Research and Development for the Advanced Wideband Open Architecture Radar System
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: General Dynamics Advanced Information Systems will provide research and development for the development of the advanced wideband open architecture radar system under a cost-plus-fixed-fee delivery order of $7,263,300. The Office of Naval Research, Arlington, Virginia, is the contracting activity.
